articles.title: El Salvador offers to house ‘American criminals,’ deportees: Rubio - The Hill
articles.description: El Salvador has offered to house criminals who are American citizens and deportees of other nationalities, according to the Secretary of State Marco Rubio. Rubio said late Monday that Salvadoran President Nayib Bukele’s offer is “the most unprecedented and ex…
